title: How to Make a Pretty Purse without Sewing

steps.headline: Take a pair of old pants that you don't want anymore.
steps.description: Cut out the legs (about 10 or 11 inches).

steps.headline: Cut one of the legs down the seam.
Turn the uncut leg inside out.
Cut a strip (about 1/2 inch wide) from the helper leg.
Tie the bunched bottom together with the strip.
Turn it outside in.
steps.description: This is the body of the purse.

steps.headline: Cut to slits(1/2 an inch is perfect) an inch down from the top.
steps.description: This is where you put the handle.

steps.headline: Cut a long strip from the helper leg or use a skinny belt as a handle.
Tie each end in the cuts.
Decorate it!
steps.description: Use sparkles, glitter, fabric, paint, ETC. It will look good and it will be yours.

text: Take a pair of old pants that you don't want anymore. Cut out the legs (about 10 or 11 inches). Cut one of the legs down the seam. This will be the "helper" leg. Turn the uncut leg inside out.  Bunch up the cut bottom.  Cut a strip (about 1/2 inch wide) from the helper leg.  Tie the bunched bottom together with the strip.  Turn it outside in. This is the body of the purse. Cut to slits(1/2 an inch is perfect) an inch down from the top. This is where you put the handle. Cut a long strip from the helper leg or use a skinny belt as a handle.  Tie each end in the cuts.  Decorate it! Use sparkles, glitter, fabric, paint, ETC. It will look good and it will be yours. Finished.
